title: Lip
description: A creamy, high-shine lip gloss with buildable color and a multidimensional, mirror-like finish for the illusion of a fuller, plumper pout.
Bubble Pop Electric is a high-performance lip gloss with a rich, ultra-smooth formula containing spherical powders for even application and superior wet, glass-like shine.
The creamy, cushiony texture melts into lips, wrapping them in comfortable, non-sticky luminous color that won’t move or bleed.

title: Face
description: Create a smooth, dewy complexion with this hydrating, lightweight, non-comedogenic, multi-use skin-prepping & priming oil.
This lightweight, multi-use oil delivers 24 hours of hydration and a visibly smoother, dewy complexion.
Use alone to prep and prime skin, or mix with your foundation for a hydration boost.
This formula contains omega-rich oils, plus skin-soothing aloe & meadowfoam seed oil.
Like all GXVE products, this facial oil is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated clean.

title: Eyes
description: So easy to use, you’ll be sculpted in seconds.
Hydrating cream contour is formulated with Squalene and Cellulose to glide on, giving you instant lift.
Silky soft-matte powder bronzer blends seamlessly for natural, sunkissed warmth.
Made to layer effortlessly for a smooth finish, never streaky.
